Experience the web without Christmas. All references to Christmas and it's leader, Santa Claus, are automatically removed.

X:ING OUT IN BOTH ENGLISH AND SWEDISH.

Tired of the commercialised holiday spirit? Not enjoying the celebration of a bearded man breaking and entering into your home once a year? Always rooted for the Grinch? Then this is the extension for you.
